overview: Between emergencies, night shifts and home visits, Inès' schedule doesn't leave her too much spare time. With the money Pascal, her husband makes, she could stop working if she wanted to. Since the couple move to the country side to escape from the city's stessful life, routine has sunk in.  Just like all young women her age, Inès needs regular sex to open up but since her husband doesn't touch her anymore, she has to seduce other men to get what she wants. Her home visits are just an excuse to meet men who are ready to give her the pleasure she's looking for.
tagline: Inès Lenvin, dream nurse and very special care
title: Inès, Private Nurse
